markdown:
I'm kinda stuck in nostalgia right now.. but I'm looking at more old playlists ([see previous note](https://gerben.dev/replies/5132ed7ce9b20efce7167e5715bd8c4c)) and I noticed the band *The Ataris*.

I used to have a band tee from them, and I lived in a small village, nobody knew them. The one day I went to a nearby bigger city, and at a grocery store an older guy (I must have been 14 at the time) saw my shirt and complimented me.

This is 23 years ago and I still remember it. Another notch for how little compliments men receive..
